"The structure of Thailand in the near future. There will be changes to the society of the elderly. "
"For about 20 years, Thai society will have an aging population increasing from 10% to 20%."
"Insurance and life insurance systems are very stable for the elderly."
"I want to see the insurance company do the basic duties properly. Compensation for insurance or life insurance. Fast and fair "

Now we are walking. Remember to include #alleskalmed if you are on twitter. You can follow the entire conversation here. bit.ly/alleskalmed
@bthansen Thank you very much for your support. I will be on my way to the election day for four new years.
@sholberg It's great with youth councils, but I think the municipalities themselves should decide if they want it. It's wrong to decide everything in Oslo.
Lisa Skogen: Hello Lisa, Ap follows the Storting saying that we need more knowledge before we can decide on oil drilling.
The Prime Minister invites Dr. Porntip to attend the audio clip. http://www.flickr.com/photos/thaigov/3883284439/
@m_arius I will win the election so I do not need a new job
@anetteic in the party program, we have set ourselves the goal of introducing 11 months of study support
Julian: Hi, we want everyone who needs it to get a nursing home. Read more at bit.ly/xdD0X
Ove Aronsen: Hi Ove, thanks for your nice message. Good learning places are important, especially to prevent dropout in high school!
@fmellem We have said that the public should take more responsibility for tannh to people. Browse, we will introduce free dental check for all over 75 years
andrea: Hi, we want more hours in school and more teachers. Read more at bit.ly/33ppC0
@druliv style Most violent acts are committed by people who are outraged. There is reason for us driving policy that limits alcohol consumption
Hilde: Hi, we want the public to take more responsibility, including free dental health care for the elderly. Read more at bit.ly/4yPeA5
@frodefjeldstad We answer as many as we go
@nilsblix The working party will improve and strengthen the Norwegian model. Frp stands for a policy more towards an am model #alleskalmed
Amina: Hi, most importantly, for young people to come to work is to complete secondary education. In addition, we have a youth guarantee to get young people at work
@matsbs We focus on research and knowledge. In addition, there are many text jobs when we, for example, bet on statoilhydro and telenor #alleskalmed
Kasper Aanerud: Hello, we have introduced interest-free loans to the municipalities so that they can clean up the swimming pool and build a new swimming pool.
@westad we have built more student housing and we are going to build even more #alleskalmed
marianne: Hi, we will continue to increase the minimum pension. From May next year we will increase it to twice the basic amount in Folketrygden.
Daniel Kristiansen: Hi, agree that teachers are important! Read more at http: bit.ly/1Nhjsz
@geirls we want to strengthen teacher education and give all teachers the right and duty to further and further education. http://bit.ly/33ppC0 #alleskalmed
9b Os Youth Club: Hi, this we have created a plan for: http: bit.ly/XOFpC
@karenghubert agree. We believe the big money will be spent on the major tasks such as education, environment and health, not on social tax cuts
@olvew hey, that's me. Adding photo later :) #alleskalmed
@theroomstops great. school is important bit.ly/33ppC0 #alleskalmed
Kristian Herse: Hello, the main thing is to get Norway safe through financial crisis and ensure work for all #alleskalmed
@vidarhaagensen together with org in the workplace we work for more people to be at work. Therefore important with low joblessness #alleskalmed
@However we have introduced a law that ensures those who work part-time preferential to expand their position #alleskalmed
Does not always use @ because many questions come via http://bit.ly/alleskalmed #alleskalmed
@toresverden good school and work for all is important for young people. Those who struggle in school will get extra follow-up. #alleskalmed
Unfortunately, unfortunately, I do not go anymore. If you have not received an answer, you can ask your spammy to @workerparty #alleskalmed
I receive with gratitude, joy, humility and hope CEP. We will make government of national unity with soul and heart with the humble and middle class
The truth is that I am very happy with the cep. The chile of the opportunities and the future is coming. The chile where the joy never retires
To cecilia my wife I ask you to repeat me every day and with the same passion the words that I give in the arenasantiago.te you passed cecilia

I have already arrived.
The Prime Minister comes to work offline.
Prime Minister of Thailand http://twitpic.com/gdw61
Opened with a video introduction to the Thai Strong 2012
Total budget of 1.4 trillion baht
Transportation, water resources, education, public health, tourism
Strong Thai Video http://twitpic.com/gdxtt
The Prime Minister of Thailand. http://twitpic.com/gdy9s
This is the worst economic crisis in years.
The government has taken measures to solve the short-term economic problems.
Thai Strong is a second term measure. And invest in the country in the long run.
Government will be fully aware of public debt. No impact on economic stability.
Investments accounted for 16% of GDP, generating 1.5 million jobs.
When the Thai economy grows The proportion of debt is reduced.
With 59% debt in 2012 will be 50%
In 2016, and is a recovery in the whole country.
Government approves budget
200000 million baht and will approve another 100000 million baht
The Ministry of Finance is explaining the details of the Thai Solidarity Program. http://twitpic.com/ge0zu
When the Act comes into force, there will be another 400000 million baht.
The first investment plan will be disclosed to the public through the website tkk2555.com.
Finance Minister launches strong Thai website http://twitpic.com/ge1z0
See detail by project and province. Name of contractor and responsible
It is a policy of the government to focus on transparency.
4 Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development

Ministry of Education has the first year of 40000 million baht.
The Ministry of Education will open the Channel Tutor on Channel 11 Saturday 10.00 - 12.00 tomorrow.
3 good books good atmosphere good librarian
3000 schools have broadband access.
Announcement of National Research University Project Budget of 3000 million
Upgrade to vocational education
The next 3 years will raise ETV as a free channel like Channel 3.
Ministry of Transport explained the ministry's project.
The dusty road 53 years to 2187 km 54-55 years to 4000 km
The Ministry of Public Health explained the details of the project.
Raising the District Health Station 9700 is a district health promotion hospital.
This year, 1000 health promotion hospitals will have regular doctors online.
The launch of the Thai Government has officially started. http://twitpic.com/ge893
Prime Minister and Minister Joins Hands to Promote Thai Strong http://twitpic.com/ge8lt
For more information, please visit www.tkk2555.com.

Ready?
What time is it?
Test offline
Hello
Good night or bad night?
My daughter's desk is offline.
Nobody talks about the council collapse in advance. But I work hard.
That's it. I want to move the country.
What's up?
The two are not a NTC.
I'm going to act out the president straight away, explaining the reason, believing everything will end well.
We do not need to see all the same.
Most have not had problems.
Depending on the issue to solve. Weekly Duty 2 Council Will help find the answer.
We have already framed the board. Talk to the political party outside. Look closer at the point of view.
I think there is a good chance.
I will amend the constitution on issues related to the public only.
The collective is the subject of the system. Democratic principles The only people not interested.
I thought he would not negotiate with me.
That's it ^ _ ^
I do not care about personal feelings. But I have a duty to maintain the law. Thaksin must be under the same law as any Thais.
What are you doing?
It is said that under the law. The society will think of forgiveness.
I want everyone to respect the law.
I have a question already.
Will it be
Thaksin is not here. Because you are Sanskrit and I live in Thailand.
The number of letters he gave was too short.
Many things are profound. I do not have it.
I do not have to guess my direction. I'm interested in the country direction. Do what is right.
Invite me
I did not go to the 19th. ^ _____ ^
Not afraid
9 Can I sleep?
I'm going abroad I need to monitor every situation every day already.
The last question is offline.
Things are more stable now and will steadily improve cos my govt adheres to democratic principles and will do what's best for the people
good night

We have already taken the first step of a long journey that will take us to a more fraternal, more cheerful, more supportive Chile. That's how we want Chile.
I said it when leaving the Servel: I need you all to build the country we all dream of, the free, big, fair Chile.
I ask God to give us all and also to me, wisdom, strength and courage to face this great mission.
